results.name: a(n) = lcm(n!,n!')/gcd(n!,n!'), where n!' is the arithmetic derivative of n! (A068311).
comment: Least common multiple of n! and its arithmetic derivative divided by greatest common divisor of n! and its arithmetic derivative.
link: Nathaniel Johnston, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
results.author: _Giorgio Balzarotti_, Apr 16 2011
